mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALPHAKA_TABLE_BOARD (BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT FROM ALPHAKA_TABLE_BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_MODDATE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT FROM ALPHAKA_TABLE_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_REGDATE DESC
